titles.title: Hosanna To The Son Of David (You are the King of Glory)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are the King of glory. You are the Prince of Peace. You are the Lord of Heav’n and earth. You’re the Son of Righteousness. Angels bow down before You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worship and adore, for, You have the words of eternal Life. You are Jesus Christ, the Lord. Hosanna to the Son of David. Hosanna to the King of Kings…Glory in the highest heaven for Jesus the Messiah reigns.{/lang-eng}
